task: Select a project for the expense record.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when Jade Green successfully selects a project and returns to the Add New Record page.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "Project:"

The screen has transitioned to a new layout where the "Project" section is now prominently displayed with options to modify or select projects. Additionally, there are new elements such as a list of project types and a checkbox, indicating the user can now manage project-related settings. (page changed from AddNewRecord to AddRecordProject)
Touch on a button that has text "Business"

The screen has transitioned to the "AddNewRecord" page, where the selected project has changed from "PROJECT" to "EXPENSE," indicating that the user has selected a different category for their record. Additionally, new buttons and text fields related to the new record have appeared, reflecting the updated context for adding a new expense. (page changed from AddRecordProject to AddNewRecord)
